Detailed Description

A Bundle object is the access point to define the life cycle of an installed bundle.

Each bundle installed in the OSGi environment will have an associated Bundle object. A bundle will have a unique identity, a long, chosen by the Framework. This identity will not change during the life cycle of a bundle, even when the bundle is updated. Uninstalling and then reinstalling the bundle will create a new unique identity.
